content.statement: vascular:venous:dvd-001-reconstruction is a fundamental concept in Health-Sciences Medicine Surgery Vascular Procedures that provides essential knowledge for understanding related topics and clinical/practical applications.

procedural_details.palma_procedure: Contralateral GSV tunneled suprapubically to bypass unilateral iliofemoral occlusion
procedural_details.valve_transplant: Axillary valve-containing segment to femoral vein
procedural_details.endovascular: IVUS-guided iliofemoral stenting for chronic obstruction

sources.source: Harrison's Principles of Internal Medicine, 21st ed. McGraw-Hill.

clinical_pearls: Palma procedure uses contralateral GSV to bypass unilateral iliac occlusion
Patient selection is critical - reserve for severe PTS failing conservative therapy
IVUS-guided stenting increasingly used for iliofemoral obstruction
